text: Has there been an update to HubSpot that affects Javascript on webpages? I've noticed some new bugs on a few of the sites I manage

SO, what are the issues you are having? I have done some defering of scripts and moving stuff around and that caused some issues with `addEventListener` on items. after window.load the listeners would disappear. Iâ€™m not even sure why, but it happened.

I'm using HubSpot's live chat on my NextJS / React app. Every time I refresh the page, there's about a 50% change I get this error. It is in the live chat code. Anyone else seen this? When the error shows, the live chat doesn't work. Otherwise, it works. Wondering if it's an async issue ...
